widevine.description: The Widevine plugin provides a DRM solution for Kaltura content. Initially, the Kaltura player checks for the Widevine browser plugin and displays a message with a download link if this plugin is missing. More info

useSupportedBrowserMsg.label: Use supported browser message
useSupportedBrowserMsg.doc: Overrides the default message text when trying to play Widevine content in an unsupported browser (Safari).
useSupportedBrowserMsg.initvalue: This video is not supported by this browser.

useSupportedBrowserTitle.doc: Overrides the default title of the message that is displayed when trying to play Widevine content in an unsupported browser.

useSupportedDeviceMsg.label: Use supported device message
useSupportedDeviceMsg.doc: Overrides the default message text when trying to play Widevine content in an unsupported device.
useSupportedDeviceMsg.initvalue: This video requires Adobe Flash Player, which is not supported by your device. You can watch it on devices that support Flash.

useSupportedDeviceTitle.doc: Overrides the default title of the message that is displayed when trying to play Widevine content in an unsupported device.

intallFlashMsg.label: Install Flash message
intallFlashMsg.doc: Overrides the message that prompts the user to install Flash.
intallFlashMsg.initvalue: This video requires Adobe Flash Player, which is currently not available on your browser. Please install Adobe Flash Player to view this video.

installFlashTitle.label: Install Flash title
installFlashTitle.doc: Overrides the title of the message that prompts the user to install Flash.

useKdpMsg.label: Use KDP message
useKdpMsg.doc: Overrides the message that prompts the user to use KDP.
useKdpMsg.initvalue: This video requires Adobe Flash enabled player.

useKdpTitle.label: Use KDP title
useKdpTitle.doc: Overrides the title of the message that prompts the user to use KDP.

promptStyle.doc: CSS Overrides the default Widevine prompt message style.
promptStyle.initvalue: border:solid 1px #eeeeee; position:fixed; z-index:1000; width:100%; height:40px; color:#505050; background-color:#FDFFDB; top:0px; right:0px; left:0px; font-family:arial; font-size:12px;

promptText.doc: Overrides the default Widevine prompt message.
promptText.initvalue: Widevine Video Optimizer plugin is needed for enabling video playback in this page.

promptLinkText.doc: Overrides the default Widevine download link text.
